P1.rationale: Dependencies broken (clingo missing), router unfixed. Must run B1 comparator first.

blocker.description: No B1 baseline comparison available; cannot assess if complex architecture adds value.

P2.rationale: Baseline b1_direct_prompting.py exists. Approve conditional on B1 >= 35% accuracy.

P3.rationale: Dual-track de-risks by exploring alternatives in parallel. Recommended fallback if voting ties.

P4.rationale: Fix infra parallel rather than freeze all tuning. Hybrid approach preferred.

conditions: 24h kill-test must complete with at least one Alt passing.
B1 baseline benchmark must be available for comparison.
If both Alts fail and B1 >= B0, pivot to P2.

top_3_risks.description: Sample size N=24 too small; Wilson CI spans 36.7pp.
Error concentration on label A (7/14 errors = 50%).

kill_shot.claim: Complex architecture provides no added value over simple baseline due to: (1) router fails on A-priority cases, (2) symbolic verifier inactive, (3) N=24 too small to prove superiority.
kill_shot.counter_plan: Run B1 baseline on N=24. If B1 >= 35% and >= B0, pivot to P2 with rule post-filter.
